page.title: 18MENS ACTIVITIES
page.content: Most of the men are involved with an occupation involving the land eg. agriculture, haulage, factory and as such are extremely busy at certain times of the year with sowing, harvesting etc. The major activities are:- Farmers Mertings - These are held on a monthly basis and usually consist of a guest speaker and discussion. They are normally well attended. Rhynie Football Team - Because of the weather matches are played in the Summer League, that is April to September. There is strong competition and unfortunately Rhynie has not been extremely successful in the past few years. This is primarily due to the fact that the majority of young men here had to leave the village to find work and an unavailable for the week-night matches.
